summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 9th Avenue South from College Street to Diagonal Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Resolution No. 9044 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
